post.title: Speaking of Steve
post.content: BTW, if you haven’t seen Steve’sentry on Isomorphism, go read it right now. He nails this whole services as contracts vs. services as code debate right on the head. The spot on nature of this post reminds me when he nailed the modeling problem on the head – another must read post if you haven’t already.
